data.text:
Morgan Spence is a Scottish journalist. He was active in brickfilming in the 2010s, and was known for films with broad appeal that often featured large layouts. His brickfilms received a considerable amount of media coverage that usually centered how young he was when he made them. He created the official music video for the Paul Oakenfold single "Who Do You Love?" at age 13.[1][2]
